name: Just Read The Instructions - Tiny Halloween Edition
name_original: Just Read The Instructions - Tiny Halloween Edition
description:
Just Read The Instructions - Tiny Halloween Edition, is a small singel player demo where you shoot pumpkins that will attack you from all sides! Get the highest score and tweet us with #JRTIScore!

It's a demo based on a full game that we are developing:

Just Read The Instructions is a surreal co-op first person shooter game where the only thing that matters is following the next set of instructions. Enemies will flood the scene, your weapons will break, more instructions will come, and then repeat.

Aspire to not die.

Reveal Trailer: 

Steam page awaits approval, but in the mean time, follow us on twitter for updates about the game: https://twitter.com/TheKnackeliban 

Or signup for our newsletter: https://www.knackelibang.com/promo/
